name: RiseBuildings
0:
”Alexa, ask rise buildings how many packages do I have today”
”Alexa, ask rise buildings if there are new packages for me today”
”Alexa, open rise buildings”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rise buildings
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Rise Buildings is a property experience platform that manages all of the daily activities in a building for both staff and residents/tenants, enhancing engagement, driving value, and increasing retention.

Check how many packages you have waiting for you with the latest Rise Buildings skill. This skill is synced with your Alexa email account for a quick, convenient experience. You can stay on top of all of your recently delivered packages without having to search through emails or notifications. Simply say “Alexa, ask Rise Buildings how many packages do I have?” to find out how many packages are waiting for you in your building.

If you don’t have a Rise Buildings account, visit RiseBuildings.com to learn more about our platform and sign up if your building has partnered with Rise.
